content: place stuff and stitch around the edge r1 chain 2 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook to secure it to the head r2 single_crochet 1 increase 1 repeat 2 times 6  stuff the arms and legs and attach them r3 single_crochet 1 increase 1 repeat 3 times 9 as shown in the finished photos r4 single_crochet 2 increase 1 repeat 3 times 12  take the tail piece fold it in half so you r5 single_crochet 3 increase 1 repeat 3 times 15 have a skinny thin piece hot-dog r6 single_crochet 6 increase 1 single_crochet 7 increase 1 17 style and use the long yarn-tail to whip- slip_stitch 1 tie off leave long tail for sewing stitch along the side of the piece then keep flat attach the tail to the back of the body  using black felt cut out two ovals for nose eyes sew or glue them to the face r1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook r2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 r3 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 r4 single_crochet 3 increase 1 repeat 6 times 30 r5 in blo single_crochet 8 decrease 1 repeat 3 times 27 r6 single_crochet 7 decrease 1 repeat 3 times 24 congrats enjoy slip_stitch 1 tie off leave long tail for sewing your elephant tail made in row across not in the round and piggie r1 chain 8 turn r2-4 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 7 tie off leave long tail for sewing
